description.en:
Rock3T is a DeFi that seeks to satisfy the same market as Bitcoin but natively on Ethereum. ROCK3T leverages a smart contract we call the Liquid Vault that supports three “T”s:
1. Trustlessness: Variable LP lock periods dependent on system health;
2. Truth: Perpetually locked LP dependent on price strength; and
3. Toughness (antifragility): Embedded Token buying pressure.
